titleStmt.title: The preachers plea or, A short declaration, touching the sad condition of our clergy, in relation to the smalnesse of their maintenance, throughout the kingdome. / By William Typing. Esq;
titleStmt.author: Tipping, William, 1598-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Christopher Meredith, at the signe of the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
